original_text: And some of the chief of the fathers gave unto the work. The Tirshatha gave to the treasure a thousand drams of gold, fifty basons, five hundred and thirty priests' garments.
korean_text: 어떤 족장들은 역사를 위하여 보조하였고 총독은 금 천 드라크마와 대접 오십과 제사장의 의복 오백삼십 벌을 보물 곳간에 드렸고

sentences.original_text: And some of the chief of the fathers gave unto the work.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 족장 중 어떤 이들은 그 일에 드렸다.

sentences.original_text: The Tirshatha gave to the treasure
five hundred and thirty priests' garments.
